name: $severity
desc: Returns: Indicates whether the issue indicates a variation from successful processing.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whether the issue indicates a variation from successful processing.

name: $code
desc: Returns: Describes the type of the issue. The system that creates an OperationOutcome SHALL choose the most applicable code from the IssueType value set, and may additional provide its own code for the error in the details element.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes the type of the issue. The system that creates an OperationOutcome SHALL choose the most applicable code from the IssueType value set, and may additional provide its own code for the error in the details element.

name: $details
desc: Returns: Additional details about the error. This may be a text description of the error or a system code that identifies the error.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Additional details about the error. This may be a text description of the error or a system code that identifies the error.

name: $diagnostics
desc: Returns: Additional diagnostic information about the issue.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Additional diagnostic information about the issue.

name: $location
desc:
Returns: This element is deprecated because it is XML specific. It is replaced by issue.expression, which is format independent, and simpler to parse. 

For resource issues, this will be a simple XPath limited to element names, repetition indicators and the default child accessor that identifies one of the elements in the resource that caused this issue to be raised.  For HTTP errors, will be "http." + the parameter name.

name: $addlocation
desc:
This element is deprecated because it is XML specific. It is replaced by issue.expression, which is format independent, and simpler to parse. 

For resource issues, this will be a simple XPath limited to element names, repetition indicators and the default child accessor that identifies one of the elements in the resource that caused this issue to be raised.  For HTTP errors, will be "http." + the parameter name.

pvardefs.desc:

name: $expression
desc: Returns: A [simple subset of FHIRPath](fhirpath.html#simple) limited to element names, repetition indicators and the default child accessor that identifies one of the elements in the resource that caused this issue to be raised.

name: $addexpression
desc: A [simple subset of FHIRPath](fhirpath.html#simple) limited to element names, repetition indicators and the default child accessor that identifies one of the elements in the resource that caused this issue to be raised.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A [simple subset of FHIRPath](fhirpath.html#simple) limited to element names, repetition indicators and the default child accessor that identifies one of the elements in the resource that caused this issue to be raised.
